extendedInfo.description: If you've already tried all other similar programs, I assure you this is the best. It has all the useful features to keep your personal finances, some of them you will not find in any other program. Below is short description of the most important of them.REAL recurring transactions. Something that not only simply recalls the payments, but also allows you to plan incomes and expenses, and forecast your financial situation. The program also includes these transactions in reports and budgets.ADVANCED, interactive reports. It is possible to analyze any data, broken down into categories, projects, payees, currency, etc. Each item of the report can be further analyzed drill down it on the other ingredients, make a monthly analysis, or simply view the transactions made up for it.SAFE data backup. Automatically created as often as you want. The program will take care about the safety of your data. Additionally, data can be password protected. The program also has support for Dropbox.FULL support for multiple currencies. The program always show you the sum value of your assets, taking into account the most recent exchange rate. The reports always show the real value in your default currency, regardless of transaction currency. Information broken down by currency is an option, not a limitation.Other examples of functions:- mechanism of budgets,- split transactions included in all program function,- suggests a categories based on previously transactions (based on the payee or memo),- account balance allows to predict your financial situation,- securing access to the program with to unlock pattern,- mechanism to reconcile accounts,- import / export in CSV format (only in PRO version),- import / export in QIF format,- and many, many others.Required permission:- read phone state and identity - alternative licensing mechanism,- write to the card - needed to backup data and exports,- executes after the system finishes booting - required by reminder,- full access to the Internet - required by the Dropbox.AppEggs.com review:"Have trouble to deal with your finances? Here the wonderful finance app named Cash Droid for Android comes to help you keep personal finances. Since you have this app, you will never worry about your personal finance issues." http://www.appeggs.com/apps/com.financial.cashdroid.ads,3930.html

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.comment: Finally somebody who understood how a personal finance app should be written. I can even track my debtors using special accounts. When I pay by credit card I can split between a category and the debtor, something that other applications I tested did not support.
reviews.author: Cristian Klein

reviews.title: For Galaxy Tab 2 10.1
reviews.comment: Agree, this is a great app.  Replaced SpB Finance on Windows Mobile device.  Easy to use, great customised reports, multi-currency, dated fx rates, qif import/export all function brilliantly. Very happy.
reviews.author: Mike Wilson

reviews.comment: Please add investment account and also transactions report shows wrong de\tPlease add investment account and investment transactions. And also transactions report shows wrong display for transfer of accounts. So please fix it and I will give 5 star.
reviews.author: Macherlu Garlapti

reviews.title: Simply the best
reviews.comment: Truly full featured and accurate. And now even better......if you really want an outstanding app for financial tracking and budgets and reconciliation and charts nd categories and sub-categories and customization and......everything.....buy this.....simples. No I do not know the developer.....used Quicken for years.....don\'t need that anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bookkeeper says Best Ever
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this for 2 years for my small business. Taxes are a cinch. I look constantly, for a better app, and there just isn\'t one. The reports are customizable, and can be memorized. If you need in depth, complete bookkeeping, this does it all, including multiple split transactions. Plus, it just gets better and better. Love it, love it, love it. Buh bye Intuit!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Big Fan
reviews.comment: I use this app several times daily. It gives me all the charts and breakdowns I could ever imagine, and makes keeping track of my spending so easy. I was on the free one, but upgraded so I could export to CSV. I also love that its linked to my dropbox, so I can use it on my phone and tablet. Highly recommend!
reviews.author: Jon Ferwerda

reviews.title: Freaking awesome!!
reviews.comment: Probably the best checkbook I\'ve seen. Works absolutely wonderfully. Only problem i\'ve had is getting it to import csv files.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is great. Most money programs just have way to much stuff in them. This one does exactly what I need, manage accounts and bills. It backs up to Dropbox.
reviews.author: Mike Cox

reviews.title: Perfect for galaxy note 2
reviews.comment: I use this for all my expenses. It\'s like having a complete book keeping system on my phone. I am an accountant and I would recommend this to anyone. It has the facility for any number of bank, cash and credit card accounts and the categories are endless. Whoever designed this must have book keeping experience. I am very very pleased with it.
reviews.author: Christine Westhead

reviews.title: GREAT!
reviews.comment: Wish I had it when I was younger. Love the cash flow projections.
reviews.author: Pavel Stoffel

reviews.comment: Use it everyday.
reviews.author: Roque Mozingo

reviews.title: Problems
reviews.comment: Update: The developer has responded but so far no fixes for my issues.  I started with the free version and had no complaints. Blocking the annoying ads was easy enough. Went for the pro version to show support and now the reconciliation feature sometimes works and sometimes doesn\'t. Also numeric entry brings up full keyboard instead of number pad.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: V.Good
reviews.comment: Used this app for a while now, found it very usefull much like ms money. One thing I\'d like to see is that when setting up a new bill that\'s spread in payments over a year most of the time it is a one payment at \302\243xx.xx and nine payments at \302\243yy.yy I dont see an option to be able to enter it like that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent Application
reviews.comment: I was using Easy Money for the last 3 years (it\'s a good app as well) when I saw Cash Droid and decided to give it a try.  At the beginning it felt different, but now I love this app.  Works flawlessly on the SGS3 and it looks very nice (compliments the ICS style very well).   Things I love in it:  Pattern to access application Looks Practicality Cloud Storage Currency Conversion for different accounts in different currencies Other :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app with reconcile capabilities
reviews.comment: Definately appreciate this app and its features, particularly since I just switched from an iPhone to a Galaxy S3 and was looking for something equivalent to the banking app I had on iPhone (was SVT Accounts). After trying several other apps the Cash Droid app fitted my needs, in particular the ability to filter your accounts view to show unreconciled items (which along with the fully featured scheduler means I can see what payments are still due to come out of my accounts and thus easily see how much money is really left in each account and which expenses are still to be paid). I would give this 5 stars if there were a couple of minor feature enhancements added: * Ability to record transfers of funds between accounts * When showing account balances include the current reconciled balance (perhaps in smaller font) along with the current total balance. * I was initially confused by the interim balance displayed in an unreconciled expense when that expense was entered on an earlier date, since it displayed the balance based on the entry order of the expenses (but it would be more useful to use the reconcile order instead of entry order)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: tried the rest... This is the best &   Use every day
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect for me
reviews.comment: I have used a couple of paid for more (expensive accounting) apps in the past but this is the only one I will use from now on. It consolidates all my necessary requirements, smooth easy operation, hide inactive accounts, categories-sub categories, import, export, backup, even to the cloud. Does not use Google Cloud though, will make that suggestion. I like what it does and will look no further for a financial manager. Well worth every cent.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, responsive developer
reviews.comment: Love this app,and the developer answered my question on authorizing immediately. My only suggestion is can the running total font be larger please? Or maybe user adjustable fonts?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disgusting
reviews.comment: It is a disgusting application. Worth nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Superb app with great functionality. Would like to auto email the backup file but much better than the many other similar apps I have tried.
reviews.author: A Google User
